frame.name: Wagering
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Gambler</fen> commits an <fen>Asset</fen> to a prediction that an <fen>Uncertain_situation</fen> will have a particular <fen>Outcome</fen> (or class of outcomes). He or she loses the <fen>Asset</fen> if the prediction ends up being incorrect, and gains it back plus additional winnings if the prediction ends up correct.
<ex><fex name="Gambler">He</fex> <t>bet</t> <fex name="Asset">$30</fex> <fex name="Uncertain_situation">on the horse race</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Gambler
FE.definition: <def-root>The person who wages the <fen>Asset</fen> on a certain Outcome.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The place where the <fen>Gambler</fen> makes the wager.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time when the <fen>Gambler</fen> makes the wager.</def-root>

FE.name: Asset
FE.definition: <def-root>Something desirable possessed by or directly associated with the <fen>Gambler</fen> which is lost if the <fen>Gambler</fen> loses the wager.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition:
<def-root>The desired action or goal that the <fen>Gambler</fen> hopes to bring about.
<ex>He <t>wagered</t> all of his remaining money <fex name="Pur">to try and at least break even</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Explanation</fen> for why the <fen>Gambler</fen> has put the <fen>Asset</fen> up in a wager.</def-root>

FE.name: Iterations
FE.definition: <def-root>The number of times that the <fen>Gambler</fen> makes wagers.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Circumstances</fen> indicates the state of affairs under which the <fen>Gambler</fen> makes a wager.</def-root>

FE.name: Beneficiary
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Gambler</fen> intends for his/her actions to benefit <fen>Beneficiary</fen> in some way.
<ex>They would <t>wager</t> all their money <fex name="ben">for their closest friends</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Outcome
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Gambler</fen> predicts that a certain <fen>Outcome</fen> will hold.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: wager.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the action of placing a bet.
